name: Tanky Wars
description:
You are surrounded by enemies and have to find ammo in order to destroy them all and complete each wave, but be careful! Some enemies also need ammo and will strive to pick them up before you do. You will also have chances to heal your wounds through some scarse life gems, so nothing to worry about... right?

- Use WASD or Keyboard Arrows to move around.

- Use Left Mouse Button to shoot projectiles.
